vlive.korean: 그건 소송 거셔야 해요 - 소송을 걸어야... Well, legal action may be required. - What? Legal... 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#197. 디앤이가 땡겨 (Danger) (w. 슈퍼주니어-D&E)
vlive.english: Well, legal action may be required. - What? Legal...

vlive.korean: 과자회사에서 형 소송 걸 수도 있어. - 아니~ The snack companies might sue you. - No~ 듣기 View video iKON : 오랜만이에용~!
vlive.english: The snack companies might sue you. - No~

vlive.korean: 그런 게 딱 저는 걸리면 전 바로 소송 들어갑니다. and I catch wind of it, I sue immediately. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]스케치 X 앞터V (Sketch X Early Interview)
vlive.english: and I catch wind of it, I sue immediately.

vlive.korean: 소송할 거야. I'm going to sue you. 듣기 View video ESteem ent. : #찐호퐝 라이브, 진경 호연 세온 광고 촬영장! (Jinkyung&Hoyeon&Seon Live)
소송 중이세요? Are you involved in a lawsuit? 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : [로맨스 특별법] 제3조 - 설렘법, 넘어갈 듯, 넘어올 듯.
vlive.english: Are you involved in a lawsuit?

examples.korean: They were sued for breach/infringement of copyright. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 저작권 침해로 소송당했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were sued for breach/infringement of copyright. Add to Wordbook
